players.name: Alice
memory:
Bob: "
I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia.
"
You: "Let's work together to uncover the mafia. I know I killed Diana last night, but we need to focus on finding out who else is involved."
Charlie: "I will investigate Bob and Alice to see if they are involved with the mafia. We need to gather more evidence before making any accusations."
Bob: "I am innocent and will cooperate with Charlie to investigate Alice. We need solid evidence before accusing anyone."
